issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Write fixed size binary arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12043](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12043). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We already write FSB when writing binary arrays, so this extends the support by removing unimplemented code paths

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12043?focusedCommentId=17310143) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
